cast.overview: Rizwan Khan, a Muslim from the Borivali section of Mumbai, has Asperger's syndrome. He marries a Hindu single mother, Mandira, in San Francisco. After 9/11, Rizwan is detained by authorities at LAX who treat him as a terrorist because of his condition and his race.
cast.title: My Name Is Khan

details.biography:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.

Kenton Duty (born May 12, 1995) is an American actor. He stars as the flamboyant European exchange student Günther Hessenheffer on the Disney Channel original series Shake It Up!.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Kenton Duty, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Kenton Duty
